DOC.brief_title: Extension Study Subjects Who Relapsed After Complete Response Study KW-0761-001

The subject Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ( ECOG ) performance status score < 2 study entry . 3 . The subject > 18 year age . 4 . The subject adequate hepatic function : bilirubin ≤ 1.5 time specific institutional upper limit normal [ ULN ] ; aspartate transaminase [ AST ] alanine transaminase [ ALT ] ≤ 2.5 x ULN ≤ 5.0 x ULN presence know hepatic malignancy . 6 . The subject receive type treatment disease since complete study , KW0761001 . 2 . The subject significant uncontrolled intercurrent illness include , limited : uncontrolled infection require antibiotic ; clinically significant cardiac disease ( class III IV New York Heart Association [ NYHA ] classification ) ; unstable angina pectoris ; angioplasty , stenting , myocardial infarction within 6 month ; uncontrolled hypertension ( systolic blood pressure > 160 mmHg , diastolic BP > 100 mmHg , find two consecutive measurement separate 1 week period ) despite two antihypertensive medication ; clinically significant cardiac arrhythmia ; uncontrolled diabetes . 3 .
